title: Jenna Dewan looks comfy as she covers up her baby bump in a sweat outfit for morning errands
text:
Jenna Dewan announced she was expecting her second child a few weeks ago.

And on Wednesday, the Step Up star, 38, stepped out in a comfy and cozy outfit for morning errands.

While out and about in Los Angeles the cover girl was bundled up in sweats.

Quick trip: On Wednesday, Jenna Dewan stepped out in a comfy and cozy outfit for morning errands in LA

The actress, who also shares her six-year-old daughter Everly with her ex husband Channing Tatum, wore a black Sub_Urban RIOT sweatshirt.

On the upper right chest area in yellow letters it said 'so happy for you.'

She teamed it with grey sweats that had a red, white and blue, 80's-style ankle cinch.

Jenna had a pair of sleek dark brown Raybans on covering her eyes and wore bright white sneakers.

SO happy: The actress, wore a black Sub_Urban RIOT sweatshirt that, on the upper right chest area, in yellow letters it said 'so happy for you'

She kept it simple for the morning trip as she wore her hair tied back in a bun and seemed to go makeup free.

Last week, the dancer opened up to People about the upcoming new addition with her boyfriend Steve Kazee, 43.

'It was excitement all around. Everywhere excitement,' she said during her interview. '[Everly] said she's waited her whole life for a sibling. "I've waited my whole life for this, Mom." It is so cute.'

She even revealed that Everly is so thrilled, she tells strangers that she is going to be a big sister.

Easy, breezy: She kept it simple for the morning trip as she wore her hair tied back in a bun and seemed to go makeup free

The news: Last week, the dancer opened up to People about the upcoming new addition with her boyfriend Steve Kazee, 43. 'It was excitement all around. Everywhere excitement,' she said during her interview. '[Everly] said she's waited her whole life for a sibling. "I've waited my whole life for this, Mom." It is so cute'

'She is going around lifting up my shirt to literally anyone, and goes, "I'm going to be a big sister! Did you know there's a baby in my mommy's belly? Do you want to touch it?" She will just lift up my shirt. She kisses [my belly].'

She went on to talk about her boyfriend of over a year who she calls a 'divine gift' in her life.

'It's this electric connection that just works,' she said about the Tony winner.

'The timing felt right. Expanding our family was something that was important to both of us and it just flowed.'

Jenna was previously married to Channing from 2009 before announcing their divorce in 2018.
description: Jenna Dewan stepped out in a comfy and cozy outfit for morning errands. While out and about in Los Angeles the cover girl was bundled up in sweats.
